thread.title: Akhil Akkineni – Shriya Bhupal marriage called off, Malayalam actress molestation case – meet the top newsmakers of this week
thread.title_full: Akhil Akkineni – Shriya Bhupal marriage called off, Malayalam actress molestation case – meet the top newsmakers of this week

author: karthika raveendran
title: Akhil Akkineni – Shriya Bhupal marriage called off, Malayalam actress molestation case – meet the top newsmakers of this week
text:
Ram Charan Teja gets engaged to Upasana Kamineni 
This week has been quite eventful what with constant updates on the Malayalam actress’ molestation case, some interesting teasers like Allu Arjun’s Duvvada Jagannadham, Madhavan-Vijay Sethupathi’s Vikram Veda teaser and a brand new poster of Baahubali 2. Also, an anticipated wedding was called off at the beginning of the week. A lot has happened – let’s give you a complete lowdown of the top 5 newsmakers of this week. 
Shriya Bhupal-Akhil Akkineni wedding cancelled – Two days ago, Tollywood fans were shocked to know Akhil Akkineni’s marriage to Shriya Bhupal was called off. Reports suggested, all those guests who were to fly out to Italy for the big grand wedding were asked to cancel their tickets. Rumours suggest, the couple was having constant fights even though they had been dating for two-three years. Also some other reports stated, akhil had developed cold feet and realised he was too young to get married. It was to be a grand destination wedding in Italy. 700 guests were invited – right from top industrialists to top actors across Bollywood and South. The couple had got engaged last year in a lavish ceremony in the presence of family and close relatives. Also Read: These 7 pics of Akhil Akkineni- Shriya Bhupal will make you sad about their break up 
Malayalam actress molestation case : On 17th February, Malayalam industry woke up to the shocking news of the molestation of leading actress. She was abducted and molested in her own car. Her driver and six other people had hatched this plan. The intention was to blackmail her but the actress didn’t give in. She filed a complaint with the police. So far, the driver, main accused Pulsar Sunil, his accomplice and another suspect have been caught with respect to this case. There have been reports that an actor-producer is connected with this case. It was earlier assumed to be Dileep, but he has slammed media reports for spreading false news about him. 
Vikram Veda teaser – The hottest cop-gangsta film is here! This film starring Madhavan and Vijay Sethupathi was out with its teaser last night. Fans have been going gaga over Madhavan and Vijay as they both play their respective roles perfectly. While Madhavan is bringing in his A-game as the cop, Vijay Sethupathi is the real surprise as the genius gangsta, who doesn’t go down without a fight. The movie is set to release this Summer. 
Baahubali 2 motion poster : On the occasion of Mahashivratri, SS Rajamouli released a brand new poster featuring Prabhas standing in a powerful pose on an elephant. For those who don’t know Baahubali is known to be a shiva devotee. In fact in his first film there is a famous scene where he stuns people by lifting a gigantic Shiva Linga single handedly and effortlessly. They also released a motion poster, thus making us more excited for the much awaited Part 2. The film is all set to release on April 28th, 2017. 
Duvvada Jagannadham teaser : Allu Arjun’s upcoming movie – Duvvada Jagannadham was out with its teaser today. It was an extension of his first look poster where Allu Arjun was seen in his traditional Brahmin avatar. His conservative avatar was a complete contrast to Pooja Hegde’s sexy image. But form looks of the teaser, there is more to his character than what meets the eye. It’s set for a summer release.
